CUT < CHOP < cutup CUT-AB

Semitic *katab- "to prick, cut, scratch, scrape", secondary: kitab

𓈕 chop ϣⲱⲡ კეპავს kˀɛpˀ Balto-Slavic *kop- PIE *(s)kep- Kerb
𓌪 PIE *(s)kep- or *(s)kap- “to hew, cut, shovel” +++

𓌎 σκέπαρνον sképarnon 𓍇 adze

𓋴 𓂝 𓃀 𓌪 | castrate | Γapar < capar cāpō > chop +++

𓋴 𓍿 𓊪 𓍉 𓏛 | cut up (animal) | chop 𓄗𓄘

𓐍 𓃀 𓊃 𓌻 𓂡||hack up (earth)|GRABENz! 𐌲𐍂𐌰𐌱𐌰𐌽 grab
𓐍 𓃀 𓊃 𓌻 𓂡||hack up (earth)|chop
𓐍 𓃀 𓏏 𓏴 𓉐||place of execution|chop-turm
𓐍 𓊪 𓈙||battle-axe|Kerbs > kirves+ kapak+++ chopper чер (čer) > ger <<<+++ < топо́р topór تبر tabar

𓐍 𓊪 𓈙 𓌛 | schimetar, battle-axe | 𓐍 Ger… "Khopesh" Axt (rituell)
𓐍 𓊪 𓈙 𓌛 | schimetar, battle-axe | "Khopesh" chops kopis κοπίς κόπτω-koptō, "to cut, to strike"

𓐍 𓊪 𓇋 𓇋 𓏏 𓀐 corpse / chopped 𓀐

𓋴 𓂝 𓃀 𓌪 | saw out (timbers), take out, circumsize, castrate | sav / saw chop Säbeln Saab = Saat ⇔ savt!

𓋴 𓂓 𓍁 𓈒 𓏥 | crops | skarp[s] 𓍁=p wegen phrui'=fruit
